import React from 'react'; import { Alert, Button, Card, CardBody, CardGroup, Col, Container, Form, FormFeedback, FormGroup , Input, InputGroup, InputGroupAddon,InputGroupText, Row } from 'reactstrap'; import {Icon} from 'react-icons-kit'; import {at} from 'react-icons-kit/fa/at'; import {pencil} from 'react-icons-kit/fa/pencil'; class LoginForm extends React.Component{ state = { email:'', password:'', emailValid: false, passwordValid: false, formValid: false, errorText:'', failed:false, touched: { email:false, password:false, } } render(){ return(

Login

Sign In to your account

{this.handleUserInput(events)}} type="text" ref={this.emailRef} placeholder="Email" invalid={this.state.touched.email ? true : false} valid={this.state.emailValid ? true : false} /> This field required. {this.handleUserInput(events)}} type="password" ref={this.passwordRef} placeholder="Password" invalid={this.state.touched.password ? true : false} valid={this.state.passwordValid ? true : false} /> Password should be at least 6 character. {this.state.errorText}

Sign up

Don't have an account?
) } } export default LoginForm;
